verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, who brought <S%H3318><s%> thee out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
Thou shalt have no other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.

Thou shalt not make <S%H6213><s%> unto thee a graven image <S%H6459><s%>, nor any likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that <S%H834><s%> is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H4325><s%>, or that is in the water under the earth <S%H776><s%>:

thou shalt not bow down <S%H7812><s%> thyself unto them <S%H5647><s%>, nor serve them <S%H3068><s%>; for I Jehovah thy God <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%>, upon the third <S%H8029><s%> and upon the fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate me <S%H8130><s%>,
and showing <S%H6213><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> unto thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> me and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>.

Thou shalt not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> that taketh <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, to keep it holy <S%H6942><s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou labor <S%H5647><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> all thy work <S%H4399><s%>;

but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: in it thou shalt not do <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>, thou <S%H1121><s%>, nor thy son, nor thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, thy man-servant <S%H5650><s%>, nor thy maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, nor thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, nor thy stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>:

for in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>, the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all that in them is <S%H5117><s%>, and rested the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: wherefore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and hallowed it <S%H6942><s%>.

Honor <S%H3513><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> and thy mother <S%H517><s%>, that thy days <S%H3117><s%> may be long <S%H748><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee <S%H5414><s%>.
Thou shalt not kill <S%H7523><s%>.
Thou shalt not commit adultery <S%H5003><s%>.
Thou shalt not steal <S%H1589><s%>.
Thou shalt not bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>.

Thou shalt not covet <S%H2530><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, thou shalt not covet <S%H2530><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, nor his man-servant <S%H5650><s%>, nor his maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, nor his ox <S%H7794><s%>, nor his ass <S%H2543><s%>, nor anything that is thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> perceived <S%H7200><s%> the thunderings <S%H6963><s%>, and the lightnings <S%H3940><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> smoking <S%H6226><s%>: and when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5128><s%>, they trembled, and stood <S%H5975><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Speak <S%H1696><s%> thou with us <S%H8085><s%>, and we will hear; but let not God <S%H430><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> with us <S%H4191><s%>, lest we die.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H430><s%>: for God is come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5668><s%> prove <S%H5254><s%> you <S%H3374><s%>, and that his fear may be before you <S%H6440><s%>, that ye sin not <S%H2398><s%>.
And the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>, and Moses <S%H4872><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> unto the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> where God was <S%H430><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Thus thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Ye yourselves have seen <S%H7200><s%> that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with you from heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Ye shall not make <S%H6213><s%> other gods <S%H430><s%> with me <S%H3701><s%>; gods of silver, or gods <S%H430><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, ye shall not make unto you <S%H6213><s%>.

An altar <S%H4196><s%> of earth <S%H127><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> unto me <S%H2076><s%>, and shalt sacrifice thereon thy burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and thy peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, thy sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and thine oxen <S%H1241><s%>: in every place <S%H4725><s%> where I record <S%H2142><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> unto thee and I will bless thee <S%H1288><s%>.

And if thou make <S%H6213><s%> me an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, thou shalt not build <S%H1129><s%> it of hewn stones <S%H1496><s%>; for if thou lift up <S%H5130><s%> thy tool <S%H2719><s%> upon it <S%H2490><s%>, thou hast polluted it.
Neither shalt thou go up <S%H5927><s%> by steps <S%H4609><s%> unto mine altar <S%H4196><s%>, that thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> be not uncovered thereon <S%H1540><s%>.
